welcome_message_body: Welcome to Soweto, where rich history and vibrant culture come together to create a truly unique experience. Take the time to explore our bustling streets, taste our delicious local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the charm of this iconic city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pilanesberg Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Central Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Grand Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lanseria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lanseria Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport. No password required.

airports.airport_name: Oliver Reginald Tambo International (Jan Smuts International)

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within South Africa.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from various destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves regional flights within Africa.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rand/Germiston Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
